Hi,

I will be using the full frontier report (e.g. queried by the JMX call=
 *
frontierReport("all")*) to extract some high-level monitoring informatio=
n
for our crawl managers,  initially simply extracting the N biggest queues=

from the frontier. I would like a short explanation on the semantics of th=
e
fields present in this report :

queue
currentSize
totalEnqueues
sessionB=
alance
lastCost (averageCost)
lastDequeueTime
wakeTime
totalSpend/totalBudg=
et
errorCount
lastPeekUri
lastQueued

Most of the fields have rather unders=
tandable names, but I'd just like to
make sure I do understand the exact se=
mantics, the unit in which values are
expressed etc. I was unable to find t=
his information in the user guide or by
searching online.

Best regards,

-=
- 
Nicolas Giraud
